idea-plugin.name: Thread Access Info
idea-plugin.description:
Debugging plugins extended with Thread access information according to Intellij Platform SDK threading rules.
Shows information about:
  • Is write Thread
  • Is write access allowed
  • Is read access allowed
  • Is dispatch Thread
  • Is disposed (in Java source code)
  • Is in impatient reader
  • Holds read lock

More details: Threading Rules

Usage

There is zero configuration. Just launch developing plugin in debug mode and see Thread Access tab next to existing Debug process tabs: Console, Threads etc.
